# The `EPCIndirectionUtils` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Provides <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol">ExecutorProcessControl</a> based indirect stubs, trampoline pool and lazy call through manager. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Provides <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol">ExecutorProcessControl</a> based indirect stubs, trampoline pool and lazy call through manager.

### writeResolverBlock() {#a317664253790f09d0e0f53c7cfbbea16}
